articles.author: Tumaini Carayol
articles.title: Simona Halep, former world No 1, hit with second anti-doping charge - The Guardian
articles.description: Simona Halep, the two-time grand slam champion and former world No 1, has been charged with a second, separate anti-doping rule violation while provisionally suspended following a positive doping test last year
articles.content: Simona Halep, the two-time grand slam champion and former world No 1, has been charged with a second anti-doping rule violation while provisionally suspended following a positive doping test last yea… [+4000 chars]

articles.author: Barry Ryan
articles.title: Thibaut Pinot: Cepeda 'a big thorn my side' in Giro d'Italia mountain heartbreak - Cyclingnews
articles.description: Frenchman broken but unbowed after stifling EF-EasyPost rider's attack on Crans-Montana on Giro d'Italia stage 13
articles.content: A hundred metres or so past the finish line at Crans Montana, Thibaut Pinot stood slumped over his handlebars, his face pressed against his forearms and hidden. His Groupama-FDJ soigneur stood by his… [+5488 chars]
